actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a retirement savings deduction for persons covered by pension plans.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax deduction for cash contributions made by an employee to a pension plan in which he is a qualified participant. Limits the amount of such deduction to the lesser of ten percent of an employee's gross compensation for a taxable year or $200.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a retirement savings deduction for persons covered by pension plans.
